data.title: Godzilla Films – Kaiju Podcast with Jorge Garcia & Ralph Apel
data.meta_description: Posts about Godzilla Films written by casinoskunk
data.meta_site_name: Kaiju Podcast with Jorge Garcia & Ralph Apel
data.text:
Category: Godzilla Films

Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

EPISODE 107 – Ralph and Jorge are BACK! On this episode they discuss Legendary’s latest entry into the Monsterverse, Adam Wingards “Godzilla X Kong: The New Empire”. It’s a monster-fest unlike anything we’ve seen before! Join them as they also talk about the toys, Monarch: Legacy of Monsters, Godzilla: Singular Point and much, much more! 4.5.2024 Continue reading Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

Godzilla Minus One

EPISODE 106 – Jorge and Ralph are BACK! What seismic event could be so powerful to get the Kaiju Podcast back on the airwaves? Why it’s Godzilla: Minus One from 2023! Join the fellas as they talk about the latest TOHO Godzilla movie, which sets Godzilla in a post WWII Japan! Will it crack our Top 5? Continue reading Godzilla Minus One

Godzilla vs. Kong

EPISODE 105 – Ralph and Jorge are BACK! Legendary released the latest film in their Monsterverse series and the guys have a lot of thoughts about this clash of the titans! After countless delays, does the film live up to the hype? Are we satisfied with the victor of the slugfest? Were we surprised by the secret character? There’s only one way to find out! Sit back and enjoy!! 4.1.2021 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla vs. Kong

Godzilla: Final Wars

EPISODE 103 – Ralph and Jorge finally watched the 2004 Godzilla slugfest! It’s Godzilla vs almost every Toho monster known to man, but the film also includes mutants and spaceships and a whole lot of people fighting and talking. 11.23.2020 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla: Final Wars

Mothra vs. Godzilla

EPISODE 100 – Jorge and Ralph celebrate their one hundredth episode by watching the classic 1964 Toho film, Mothra vs Godzilla and Godzilla vs the Thing! Does it break the Top 5 and just how bad are the native depictions in the film? Join us as we tackle Ishiro Honda’s epic! 10.27.2020 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Mothra vs. Godzilla

Godzilla & Mothra: The Battle for Earth

EPISODE 94 – As Ralph and Jorge head towards the finish line of the podcast, they tick another Godzilla film off the list! It’s the 1992’s Godzilla film starring the Big G, Mothra and new combatant Battra!! Get ready for a three-way battle that pits Godzilla vs two flying Kaiju! 07.13.2020 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla & Mothra: The Battle for Earth

Ghidorah, the Three Headed Monster

EPISODE 90 – Ralph and Jorge watched Ishiro Honda’s 1964 film that stars more than just the “three headed monster”! In fact, we get Rodan, Mothra and Godzilla! We also discuss the lack of aliens seen onscreen but are in awe of the costumes of the Selgina people. Sit back and enjoy! 05.05.2020 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Ghidorah, the Three Headed Monster

Godzilla Raids Again & Gigantis the Fire Monster

EPISODE 81 – Jorge and Ralph watched Godzilla Raids Again (1955) and its 1959 American counterpart Gigantis the Fire Monster. How far does the American version stray from the original Japanese version. Not a whole lot, with the exception of some really key elements! 01.20.2020 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla Raids Again & Gigantis the Fire Monster

Godzilla (1998)

EPISODE 78 – Ralph and Jorge are celebrating their third anniversary by talking about the Roland Emmerich American Godzilla film starring Matthew Broderick and a bunch of Simpsons’ actors! This episode also contains a really BIG ANNOUNCEMENT! 11.21.2019 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla (1998)

Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla 2

EPISODE 70 – Ralph and Jorge watched the sequel to 1974 Godzilla vs Mechagodzilla? Well, not quite. In this 1993 film, we get a couple of Radons, Baby Godzilla, “Cornrows” Godzilla and the big Mecha-G! It doesn’t take a crotch brain to enjoy this one! 8.13.2019 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla vs. Mechagodzilla 2

Godzilla: King of the Monsters

EPISODE 63 – Jorge and Ralph each saw Mike Dougherty’s love letter to Toho fans twice, and are going to give their thoughts on Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019)! Legendary releases their third film in the Monster Universe series and it is the biggest one yet! This episode talks about the film in great detail, so beware of SPOILERS! 6.01.2019 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla: King of the Monsters

Godzilla (2014)

EPISODE 62 – Since Ralph and Jorge are getting excited to see Godzilla: King of the Monsters in theaters soon, they have decided to revisit Gareth Edwards’ 2014 Godzilla film! Does it hold up? We are about to find out! 5.06.2019 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla (2014)

Son of Godzilla

EPISODE 54 – Ralph and Jorge are talking about Jun Fukuda’s 1967 film, Son of Godzilla. Ralph kept falling asleep and has trouble keeping Kamacuras and Komunga straight while Jorge does a killer Minilla impression! 1.02.2019 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Son of Godzilla

Destroy All Monsters

EPISODE 52 – Ralph and Jorge are celebrating their second anniversary show in grand fashion! On this episode we are dicussing Ishiro Honda’s 1968 epic! Aliens from outer space take control over Godzilla, Rodan, Anguirus, Gorosaurus, Mothra, Minilla, Manda, Kumonga, Baragon, Varan and King Ghidorah! 12.05.2018 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Destroy All Monsters

Terror of Mechagodzilla

EPISODE 47 – Jorge and Ralph are discussing Ishiro Honda’s final Godzilla movie, which pits the Big G up against Mechagodzilla and Titanosaurus! Due to strange circumstances, the guys watched two different versions of the film, one which included some fake boobs! 9.20.18 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Terror of Mechagodzilla

Godzilla vs. Megalon

EPISODE 41 – Ralph and Jorge are talking about Godzilla, Megalon, Gigan and Jet Jaguar! It’s finally time to take a look at Godzilla vs Megalon. There is so much to unwrap in this film but we really just want to talk about that fish paddler! 6.08.2018 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla vs. Megalon

Godzilla: Planet of the Monsters

EPISODE 39 – Ralph and Jorge are talking about the Toho animated Godzilla film. In this first installment of the trilogy, Earth has been overrun by monsters and Godzilla is king! It’s up to a small group of humans, who have returned from space 20,000 years in the future, to defeat Godzilla and reclaim the Planet of the Monsters! The film is currently available on Netflix. 5.17.2018 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla: Planet of the Monsters

Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah

EPISODE 36 – Jorge and Ralph are talking about the 1991 Toho Godzilla film that has it all! Robots, time travel, UFOs, Dorats, Dinosaurs and most importantly Mecha-King Ghidorah!! Will this movie break our Kaiju Pod Top 5? There’s only one way to find out! 3.05.2018 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla vs. King Ghidorah

Godzilla vs. Biollante

EPISODE 32 – Jorge and Ralph have a lot to unpack after watching this 1989 Godzilla film. They have so many questions about Godzilla Cells, Spies, Dead Daughters and THE DEVIL MAN! 1.22.18 LISTEN HERE Continue reading Godzilla vs. Biollante
